Uses of Class
com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.ValueTranslatorFactory

  • Packages that use ValueTranslatorFactory 
    Package Description
    com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate  
    com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.opt  
    com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.opt.joda  

    • Uses of ValueTranslatorFactory in com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate

      Subclasses of ValueTranslatorFactory in com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ByteArrayTranslatorFactory
      Translates a byte[] to Blob.
      class  EnumTranslatorFactory
      Knows how to convert Enums to the datastore String
      class  KeyTranslatorFactory
      Knows how to convert Key objects to datastore-native Key objects and vice-versa.
      class  RefTranslatorFactory
      Knows how to convert Ref objects to datastore-native Key objects and vice-versa.
      class  SqlDateTranslatorFactory
      The datastore can't store java.sql.Date, but it can do java.util.Date.
      class  StringTranslatorFactory
      Knows how to convert Strings.
      class  TextTranslatorFactory
      Knows how to convert Texts.
      class  TimeZoneTranslatorFactory
      Converts java.util.TimeZone
      class  URLTranslatorFactory
      The datastore can't store URL, so translate it to a String and back.

    • Uses of ValueTranslatorFactory in com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.opt

      Subclasses of ValueTranslatorFactory in com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.opt 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BigDecimalLongTranslatorFactory
      This a simple strategy for storing BigDecimal in the datastore.

    • Uses of ValueTranslatorFactory in com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.opt.joda

      Subclasses of ValueTranslatorFactory in com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.opt.joda 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BigMoneyStringTranslatorFactory
      Stores BigMoney as its string representation.
      class  DateTimeZoneTranslatorFactory
      Stores a joda DateTimeZone as its String id.
      class  LocalDateTimeTranslatorFactory
      Stores LocalDateTime as a String in ISO8601 format (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSS)
      class  LocalDateTranslatorFactory
      Stores LocalDate as a String in ISO format: yyyy-MM-dd
      class  LocalTimeTranslatorFactory
      Stores LocalTime as a String in ISO8601 format: HH:MM:SS.ZZZZ
      class  MoneyStringTranslatorFactory
      Stores Money as its string representation.
      class  ReadableInstantTranslatorFactory
      Converts Joda ReadableInstants (DateTime, DateMidnight, etc) into java.util.Date
